writer.name: 阿尔珀·基维尔西姆 Alper Kivilcim

director.name: 厄兹古尔·巴卡尔 Özgür Bakar

introduction: Burcu is a girl who was left to a dormitory door when she was a baby years ago and adopted by Zahide, the owner of the dormitory. Zahide thinks that Burcu is a brain disease that has no cure and makes him grow away from people. Burcu, who grew up after closed doors until his 20s, echoed in the dorm corridors. Burcu, who cannot speak and is as violent as an animal, speaks about it, even though he lives behind four walls. The girls in the dormitory claim that Burcu is a genie and that is why he is like this. Kübra, who decided to become a nurse when her mother died due to doctors' neglect, is also a new student of the country. Kübra tries to deal with the bullying of the girls in the dormitory and when she becomes aware of Burcu's existence, she decides to do something for her.
